walkthrough.quickTour.title: Quick Tour of the HUD
walkthrough.quickTour.description:
The AI-101 HUD overlays your editor with transparent agents that work in the background.

**HUD Components:**
- **Agents**: Circular indicators showing AI agent status
- **Vital Signs Bar**: Real-time metrics (tokens, cost, FPS)
- **Alerts**: Contextual suggestions and warnings

**Try it now:**
[Toggle HUD](command:ai-101-ts.toggleHUD) | [Focus HUD for Keyboard Navigation](command:ai-101-ts.focusHud)

**Tip:** Press `Ctrl+Alt+H` (or `Cmd+Alt+H` on Mac) to quickly toggle the HUD visibility.

walkthrough.firstSuggestion.title: Accept Your First Suggestion
walkthrough.firstSuggestion.description:
AI agents analyze your code and provide contextual suggestions.

**How it works:**
1. Agents monitor your code in real-time
2. Suggestions appear as alerts in the HUD
3. Review and accept/reject with keyboard shortcuts

**Keyboard Shortcuts:**
- `Ctrl+Enter` (or `Cmd+Enter`): Accept suggestion
- `Ctrl+Backspace` (or `Cmd+Backspace`): Reject suggestion

**Try it now:**
[View Architecture](command:ai-101-ts.viewArchitecture) | [Configure API Keys](command:ai-101-ts.configureApiKeys)

**Next Steps:**
- Configure your LLM provider (OpenAI, Anthropic, or custom)
- Explore accessibility options
- Check out the full documentation
